constitution_rules.title: Add Module Procedure
constitution_rules.description: To add a module: create both canonical folders (STR-003/STR-004); add required snapshots and keys (SCH-001…SCH-006); then pass all CI checks (VAL-001…VAL-007).
requirements: Create both extension and GSMD folders per canonical mapping (STR-003, STR-004)
Add messages and receipts_schema snapshots with required keys (SCH-001)
Pass all automated checks (VAL-001 through VAL-007)
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Remove Module Procedure
constitution_rules.description: To remove a module: delete both canonical folders; update any enumerations/mappings; re-run CI to ensure no dangling references (VAL-001).
requirements: Remove both extension and GSMD folders
Update mapping enumerations
Re-run CI to ensure no dangling references (VAL-001)
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Require Core Snapshot Files
constitution_rules.description:
Each GSMD module MUST contain:
• `messages/v1/snapshot.json` with `messages.problems`, `messages.status_pill`, `messages.cards`
• `receipts_schema/v1/snapshot.json` with `receipts.required`, `receipts.optional`
requirements: Every module MUST provide `messages/v1/snapshot.json` with `messages.problems`, `messages.status_pill`, `messages.cards` keys
Every module MUST provide `receipts_schema/v1/snapshot.json` with `receipts.required` and `receipts.optional` keys
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Require Top-Level Fields in All Snapshots
constitution_rules.description: Every `.../v1/snapshot.json` MUST include all required top-level fields defined in the Constitution.
requirements: Each snapshot JSON MUST include: `snapshot_id`, `module_id`, `slug`, `version`, `schema_version`, `policy_version_ids`, `snapshot_hash`, `signature`, `kid`, `effective_from`, `evaluation_points`, `messages`, `rollout`, `observability`, `privacy`, `evidence`, `receipts`, `tests`
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce Snapshot Versioning
requirements: `schema_version` MUST equal "1.0.0"
`version.major` MUST equal 1
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce Single Policy Version ID
constitution_rules.description: `policy_version_ids` MUST be an array of length 1.
requirements: `policy_version_ids` MUST be array of length 1
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce KID Format (“ed25519”)
requirements: `kid` field MUST contain "ed25519" substring
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce Evaluation Points List Type
requirements: `evaluation_points` MUST be a list
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce Module-Folder Binding
constitution_rules.description: Specifies exact folder paths for each module code (M01–M20) in both VS Code extension and GSMD directories.
requirements: Each M01-M20 MUST map to exactly one VS Code extension folder
Each M01-M20 MUST map to exactly one GSMD folder
Folder paths MUST match canonical mapping exactly
constitution_rules.validation: Automated check verifies folder existence against canonical mapping.

constitution_rules.title: Enforce Module Code as Primary Key
constitution_rules.description: Establishes module code (M01–M20) as primary identifier for all folder bindings.
requirements: Module code MUST be used as primary identifier for all folder bindings
No alternative identifiers may supersede module codes
constitution_rules.validation: Automated check verifies module code consistency across mappings.

constitution_rules.title: Require Extension Folder Path
constitution_rules.description: For each MXX, the extension folder MUST exist at `src/modules/mXX-<slug>/`.
requirements: Extension folder MUST exist at `src/modules/mXX-<slug>/` for each module code MXX
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: Require GSMD Folder Path
constitution_rules.description: For each MXX, the GSMD folder MUST exist at `gsmd/gsmd/modules/MXX/`.
requirements: GSMD folder MUST exist at `gsmd/gsmd/modules/MXX/` for each module code MXX
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Verify Canonical Folders per Module
constitution_rules.description: For each MXX, assert exactly one extension folder at `src/modules/mXX-<slug>/` and exactly one GSMD folder at `gsmd/gsmd/modules/MXX/`.
requirements: For each MXX, assert exactly one extension folder at `src/modules/mXX-<slug>/`
For each MXX, assert exactly one GSMD folder at `gsmd/gsmd/modules/MXX/`
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate Top-Level Snapshot Fields
constitution_rules.description: Validate that every `.../v1/snapshot.json` contains all required top-level fields.
requirements: Validate that every `.../v1/snapshot.json` contains all required top-level fields
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate Messages Snapshot Keys
requirements: Validate `messages.problems`, `messages.status_pill`, `messages.cards` exist in `messages/v1/snapshot.json`
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate Receipts Schema Keys
requirements: Validate `receipts.required` and `receipts.optional` exist in `receipts_schema/v1/snapshot.json`
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate Snapshot Version Pair
requirements: Validate `schema_version == "1.0.0"` in all snapshots
Validate `version.major == 1` in all snapshots
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate KID Format
requirements: Validate `kid` contains "ed25519" in all snapshots
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.

constitution_rules.title: CI: Validate Evaluation Points Type
requirements: Validate `evaluation_points` is a list/array in all snapshots
constitution_rules.validation: Automated checks verify compliance with stated requirements.
